citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process on 08/05/2014.
Correct for all future unannounced inspections.
